tool_description: This API collect News related to Cryptocurrency like bitcoin, ethereum, solana, etc.. and NFT worldwide from the major nouns site.
name: CryptoCurrency  and NFT News
title: CryptoCurrency  and NFT News

api_list.name: Get All NFT & Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve all NFT & Crypto News across different sources...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-and-nft-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-and-nft-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto/NFTNews Sources
api_list.description: This edpoint will return only data from a particular source... i.e: coindesk
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-and-nft-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/coinmarketcap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-and-nft-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-and-nft-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{cryptonewsid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-and-nft-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
